AGENT_MGMT.DESCRIPTION: An agent is a member of your customer support team who can view and respond to user messages. The list below shows all the agents in your account.

LIST.404: There are no agents associated to this account
LIST.TITLE: Manage agents in your team
LIST.DESC: You can add/remove agents to/in your team.
LIST.NAME: Name

ADD.TITLE: Add agent to your team
ADD.DESC: You can add people who will be able to handle support for your inboxes.

NAME.LABEL: Agent Name
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a name of the agent

EMAIL.LABEL: Email Address
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter an email address of the agent

API.EXIST_MESSAGE: Agent email already in use, Please try another email address
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Jangkau server, Please try again later
Could not connect to Jangkau server, Please try again later

TICKET.HEADER_DESC: This page contains configurations for the ticket system, priorities, and categories for your CS Bot.
TICKET.SYSTEM_DESC: If disabled, all conversations will be redirected to agents.
TICKET.PRIORITY_DESC: Set priority levels and optionally define conditions (e.g., keywords).
TICKET.CATEGORY_DESC: Set categories and optionally define conditions.

NAME.LABEL: Agent Name
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a name of the agent

EMAIL.LABEL: Email Address
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter an email address of the agent

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Jangkau server, Please try again later

PASSWORD_RESET.ADMIN_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: An email with reset password instructions has been sent to the agent
PASSWORD_RESET.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Jangkau server, Please try again later

FORM_CREATE.AI_AGENT_PERSONA_LANG_STYLE: Bot AI Persona and Language Style
FORM_CREATE.AI_AGENT_PERSONA_LANG_STYLE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the persona and language style of the AI Bot
FORM_CREATE.ROUTING_CONDITION_PLACEHOLDER: Determine when the AI Bot should hand over the chat to a human agent. After that, the chat status will change to Open and appear in the Chat Assigned tab.

AGENT_MGMT.TEXT_KNOWLEDGE_PLACEHOLDER:
Enter important information about your business, products, services, or policies here.

Example: Our store is open Monday to Saturday, from 8 AM to 5 PM. For returns, customers must include a proof of purchase within 7 days.

BOOKING_BOT.HEADER_DESC: This page contains configuration settings for your Booking Bot.
BOOKING_BOT.AUTH_DESC: Authenticate with Google to automatically create spreadsheets containing data from your AI Agent. After successful authentication, the system will immediately create a new spreadsheet in your Google account.
BOOKING_BOT.LOCATION_PLACEHOLDER: Example: Clinic A, Field 1, Room 203, etc.

WEBSITE_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Add website links to be used as knowledge sources for this bot. The bot will use the content from these websites to answer user queries.
WEBSITE_SETTINGS.BATCH_DESCRIPTION: Will search and collect content from the site, excluding files
WEBSITE_SETTINGS.SINGLE_DESCRIPTION: One link to directly explore its contents
WEBSITE_SETTINGS.DELETE_MODAL_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this data?
WEBSITE_SETTINGS.DELETE_MODAL_MESSAGE: You will not be able to recover this data
